fix(config): Apply config change from Atom, process lockingnnSummary:nhttps://github.com/atom/atom/commit/d1c44dcb54994eb733eff0bfde69c8454aeff22cnnAlso lock config across processes to prevent the user from being logged out when the main process reads config before it's finished writing. This is what is causing the login window to appear.nnTest Plan: Rapidly tap between the two display modes. Note that it no longer reverts to the wrong one intermittently.nnReviewers: evannnReviewed By: evannnDifferential Revision: https://phab.nylas.com/D1931
